_source.text: A 2013 model for instance would be able to replicate the past 20 years much better than any 1993 models did projecting 20 years out from that time.

text: A **2013** model for instance would be able to replicate the past 20 years much **better** **than** any **1993** models did projecting 20 years out from that time.

_source.text: Additionally, while it's true that progress in technology is incremental, a high-end bike in 2013 is vastly better than one from 1993.

text: Additionally, while it's true that progress in technology is incremental, a high-end bike in **2013** is vastly **better** **than** one from **1993**.
